Application Form for Automatic Premium Loan Option
自動保費貸款選項申請表
Automatic Premium Loan Option
自動保費貸款選項
Declaration
聲明
I request to apply Automatic Premium Loan clause to the policy which the amount of premium or premium and levy shall be automatically
deemed to be paid by a premium loan and extend to the premium(s) or premium(s) and levy(ies) for any supplementary benefit(s) when the
Plan is paid up.
本人申請應用自動保費貸款條文於此保單,即保費或保費及徵費將自動以貸款的形式繳交,並延續條文於本計劃已繳清所有保費時的附加保障之保費
或保費及徵費。
I declare that I have read and confirm understanding of the important notes below.
本人在此聲明本人已閱讀並確認明白下列注意事項之內容。
Important Notes
注意事項
1. We shall charge you interest on the Automatic Premium Loan(s) starting from the date when the respective Automatic Premium Loan(s)
is incurred. We shall determine the interest rate charged on the Automatic Premium Loan(s).
本公司將會由自動保費貸款日期開始收取自動保費貸款的利息,有關利率將由本公司釐訂。
2. The policy will be automatically terminated once the total outstanding loan amount (including interest) owing to us under your policy
exceeds stated percentage on Policy Contract of the guaranteed cash value of your policy minus all Advanced Claims being paid and / or
payable of this Plan.
本計劃將在 閣下的保單所欠本公司之未償還總金額(包括利息)超過合約訂明比率之保單保證現金價值扣除於本計劃須支付及/或已付訖的預
支賠償總額時立即終止。
I/We declare that I/we have read and confirm understanding of the above content.
本人/吾等在此聲明本人/吾等已閱讀並確認明白上述之內容。

日
Month
月
Year
年

(if other than the Life Proposed / Life
Assured)

顧問 ( 即見證人 ) 簽署

Two witnesses are required if signature chop or fingerprint is used to sign. 若以圖章蓋印或指紋簽署,須有兩位見證人。
Please DO NOT sign on BLANK form. 請勿在空白表格上簽署。

results.title_name_tc: 交銀信託提供之保單信託服務
results.content_en:
1. Steps in establishing policy trust with Bank Comm/Life Administration
Clients can proceed with 2 methods of setting up policy trust after attending sales
interview at the Bank of Communications Trustee Company (refer to item 4.2). Either
name the Trustee as the Beneficiary or using Absolute Assignment to pass the policy
ownership to the Trustee. It is the responsibility of BOCT staff to advise which
method is more suitable to the clients.
1.1 Using Absolute Assignment
- Policies must be issued after reasonable time (3 weeks preferred) before
approaching any clients for trustee applications.
a) Sign trust application with Bank of Communications Trustee (thereafter
shortened as "BOCT")
b) Obtain confirmation with BOCT by issuing Trust Deeds, usually around 3 -4
weeks.
c) Agents will be notified by BOCT and should prepare the policy change form,
i.e. Absolute Assignment Form with Policyowner's signature to Prudential
accordingly, pending attachments as specified in item 3 below. The workflow
shall follow the existing practice as set forth by Life Administration.
d) The required documents (see item 3 below) will be submitted by BOCT to Life
Administration and the Company reserves the right to call for additional
documents for incomplete cases.
e) Upon completion, Company will issue confirmation notices to the Assignee and
the Assignor (with cc copy to agent).
f) Future correspondence will be sent to the Assignee, ie. the Trustee Co. instead
of original Policyowner (i.e. the Settlor) subsequent to the confirmation.
1.2 Using beneficiary appointment
- Policies must be issued after reasonable time (3 weeks preferred) before
approaching any clients for trustee applications.
a) Sign trust application with Bank of Communications Trustee (thereafter
shortened as "BOCT")
b) Obtain confirmation with BOCT by issuing Trust Deeds, usually around 3 -4
weeks.
c) Agents will be notified by BOCT and should prepare the policy change form,
i.e. Beneficiary Appointment Form with Policyowner's signature to
Prudential accordingly, pending attachments as specified in item 3 below. The
workflow shall follow the existing practice as set forth by Life Administration.
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)

disablement (e.g. one limb lost).
1.2.1(a)(1)
Personal Accident and Sickness Insurance(人身意外及疾病保險)
A traditional
form of cover, providing stated benefits for accidental death and various specified
injuries, with weekly benefits for temporary disability. Only weekly benefits are
included in the sickness cover.
1.2.1
Personal Lines Insurance(個人險種)
Non-commercial insurance designed to
satisfy the private needs of individuals, including private motor insurance, household
insurance, etc.
2.3.1(a)
(xv)Physical Hazards(實質危險)
The objective, physical features of a proposed risk,
bearing upon the likelihood or extent of claims.
2.1.2(a)
"Plain English” Policy(「淺白英語」保單)
A policy whose wording is more
"user friendly" and comprehensible to the general public than traditional wording.
Mostly used with personal lines insurance (e.g. household insurance).
2.3.1(a)
Pleasure Craft Insurance(遊艇保險)
Insurance of pleasure craft, covering
property and liability risks.
1.7.3
Policy(保險單(或保單))
The most formal and most commonly used
documentary evidence of the existence and terms of a particular insurance contract.
2.2.3(b)
Policy Conditions(保單條件)
Put simply, these are various standard, written
provisions regulating the insurance contract.
2.3.1(b)(v), 2.3.2(b)
Policy Specification(保單說明書) Same as Specification(說明書). 1.4.1a(b)(ii)
Pro Rata Average (Non-Marine)(比例分攤(非水險))
A contractual penalty
for under-insurance, whereby the amount of loss payable by the insurer is reduced in
proportion to the degree of under-insurance.
1.3.1(b)(vi)
Products Liability Insurance(產品責任保險)
It covers liability in respect of
injury or damage caused by goods sold, supplied or repaired, services rendered, etc.
and happening elsewhere than on premises owned or occupied by the insured. 1.6.2
Professional Indemnity Insurance(專業彌償保險) A liability insurance covering
professional people (doctors, lawyers, insurance brokers, etc.) for legal liability in
respect of injury, death, loss or damage caused through their mistakes in professional
acts or omissions.
1.6.3
Proposal Form(投保書(或投保單))
A questionnaire, often constituting the
basis of the proposed contract, designed to obtain information from a prospective
insured on the risk he wishes to insure. Also known as an Application ( ) .
2.1(a)
Protection and Indemnity Associations (P&I Clubs)(船東保賠組織)
Insurance organizations formed by shipowners mainly to cover the members against
those marine liability risks which profit-making insurers traditionally would not cover.
1.7(g)
(xvi)

results.content_en:
st application with Bank of Communications Trustee (thereafter
shortened as "BOCT")
b) Obtain confirmation with BOCT by issuing Trust Deeds, usually around 3 -4
weeks.
c) Agents will be notified by BOCT and should prepare the policy change form,
i.e. Beneficiary Appointment Form with Policyowner's signature to
Prudential accordingly, pending attachments as specified in item 3 below. The
workflow shall follow the existing practice as set forth by Life Administration.
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)d) The required documents (see item 3 below) will be submitted by BOCT to Life
Administration and the Company reserves the right to call for additional
documents for incomplete cases.
e) Upon completion, Company will issue confirmation notices to the Policyowner
(with cc copy to agent).
f) Future correspondence will be sent to original Policyowner subsequent to the
confirmation as usual (as there is no change in policy ownership).
2. Minimum Requirement for setting up policy trust with BOCT
- By Sum Insured: Not less than HK$3 Million (including policy issued with
Prudential and other companies)
- By Assets: Not less than HK$3 Million (including cash value of policy and other
tangibles assets and properties)
- Discretion will be exercised by Bank of Communication Trustee if the above
amount is not met.
- Applying the usual practice of excluding US citizens from the purchase of
investment linked plan, the same restriction will be applied to the discretionary
beneficiaries as set out in the Trust, plus the exclusion for Japanese citizens for all
plans.
3. Documents required for submission to Life Administration
(in accordance with the best practice laid down in the guidance notes of OCI)
- Trust Deed containing Settlor name and beneficiaries name in full
- Relationship declaration of the beneficiaries as contained in the Trust Application
Form or any other supplementary sheet
- Nationality of the Settlor and the beneficiaries (US citizenship will be excluded
for linked policies, Japanese citizenship for all policies, see item 2 above)
4. Responsibilities
4.1 Agent's role
- Agent shall act a referrer and should play no active role in the trust application.
Agents are strongly advised not to give advice on the type of trust and the
consequence, and shall from time to time, refer the client to consult sales staff
from BOCT or their own lawyer if in doubt.
- Agent has NO obligation to sign as witness during the trust application.
- Agent can decide on his own whether to join the sales meeting with the service
provider or not.
- Agent has NO commission from Bank of Communication Trustee in any
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)

我們會不時更新我們的私隱通知,並建議閣下瀏覽本公司網站以了解該私隱通知。該私隱通知可在本公司網站
[https://www.prudential.com.hk/scws/pages/tc/privacy-policy/index.html〕 上查閱。閣下填妥並繼續提交本表格,即表示閣下確認已閱讀並理解
本收集個人資料聲明。
業務合作夥伴指我們的服務供應商、提供行政、電信、電腦、信息技術、數據處理及儲存、客戶滿意度分析、支付、印刷、贖回或其
他服務予我們,以使我們能夠經營我們業務,會計師、審計師、IT服務和平台供應商、保險中介機構、再保險承保人、投資經理、代理、
退休金受託人(和其他持分者)、計劃顧問、介紹人、核准的第三方金融和保險產品供應商以及我們的法律顧問。
營銷合作夥伴指我們的服務供應商提供行政、電信、電腦、支付、印刷、第三方獎賞/會員/優惠計劃、醫療/健康/保健相關產品、
贖回或其他服務,以使我們能夠經營我們業務、保險中介、退休金受託人(和其他持分者)、計劃顧問、介紹人和核准的第三方金融
和保險產品供應商。

本人申請應用自動保費貸款條文於此保單,即保費或保費及徵費將自動以貸款的形式繳交,並延續條文於本計劃已繳清所有保費時的附加保障之保費

2. The policy will be automatically terminated once the total outstanding loan amount (including interest) owing to us under your policy
exceeds stated percentage on Policy Contract of the guaranteed cash value of your policy minus all Advanced Claims being paid and / or
payable of this Plan.
本計劃將在 閣下的保單所欠本公司之未償還總金額(包括利息)超過合約訂明比率之保單保證現金價值扣除於本計劃須支付及/或已付訖的預

PAIUWH1512Part 5 第五部分 Declaration and Authorization (Continued)聲明及授權(績)
本人/吾等,受保人/保單持有人,授權以下各項(1)任何醫生、醫院、診所、保險公司、僱主、機構或人士,將已經或其後存錄的有關
本人/吾等之醫療病歷、紀錄或其他資料披露予保誠保險有限公司,作為評估及處理此保單更改或復效申請及索償及提供其後服務之用。
為免任何疑問,本授權書對本人/吾等之繼承人、承讓人、遺囑執行人及遺產管理人均具有約束力。即使本人/吾等死亡或無行為能力
(包括但不限於精神上無行為能力),本授權書仍具效力。本授權書之副本將被視為與正本具同樣效力;(2)貴公司或任何由貴公司指定
之醫生、醫務人員或化驗所,可就此保單更改或復效申請或任何有關索償申請替本人/吾等進行所有所需之醫療評估及測試,以審核本人
/吾等之健康狀況。
只適用於「自願醫保」計劃
本人/吾等,作為受保人/保單持有人,在此聲明並同意:(1)保誠保險有限公司(「貴公司」)並未正式接納保單更改或復效,且於有
關批註 (「批註」)發出予本人/吾等前,任何保單更改或復效將不會生效;(2)此問卷收集與健康相關的資料僅作為核保之用途,而核
保是貴公司評估申請人之健康風險及決定申請結果的程序。貴公司採用的核保程序應為公平合理,並會因應本人/吾等要求解釋批註申請
結果;(3)作為申請人,本人/吾等需要盡其所知所信,按本問卷中要求向貴公司提供完整及準確的資料。貴公司根據本人/吾等提供的資
料,可能會提出跟進問題或查詢而需要本人/吾等進一步提供資料以作核保之用,而已提供之資料完全屬實並將會是合約的依據;(4)若
本人/吾等在提交本批註申請書後至本人/吾等收到批註前的期間就本問卷中提供的資料有任何改變或更新,本人/吾等需要及早通知貴公
司;(5)即使已成功獲簽發批註,若本人/吾等未按(3)所述盡其所知所信向貴公司提供完整及準確的資料,或未按(4)所述就資料的任何
改變或更新而及早通知貴公司,本人/吾等的保險保障可能會受到影響,貴公司亦可能因此終止、作廢或撤銷有關批註及/或保單,或拒
絕賠償;(6)假如對事實或資料的重要性產生疑問時,必須在本申請書上向貴公司披露該事實或資料。
只適用於「自願醫保」以外計劃(不論基本計劃或附加保障)
本人/吾等,受保人/保單持有人,在此聲明並同意(1)保誠保險有限公司(「貴公司」)未正式接納保單更改或復效及發出有關批註
(「批註」)予本人/吾等前,任何保單更改或復效將不會生效;(2)本人/吾等沒有保留任何重要的事實或資料,而已提供之事實及資

From 1 January 2018 onwards, a levy on insurance premiums for insurance policies will be payable to IA by policyowner. IA will collect the levy from policyowner

policy (or multiple life insurance policies) (collectively "existing life insurance policy(ies)") that you have or had, or any savings made by reducing the premium
payable under your existing life insurance policy in the past or next 12 months, by means of the followings:
閣下是否打算在未來緊接的十二個月內,或已經在過去的十二個月內,使用或打算使用 閣下現時或曾經持有的一張或多張人壽保單
(下稱“現有人壽保單”)透過下列方式取得資金或節省保費,以資助購買新人壽保單所需的費用?
1. Reducing the total cash value, sum assured, other policy value(s) or policy right(s) of the existing life insurance policy(ies), by exercising the policy right
under the existing life insurance policy(ies) (including wholly or partially withdrawal, wholly or partially surrender);
2. Taking out a policy loan from the existing life insurance policy (ies);
3. Reducing, suspending or non-payment of premium under the existing life insurance policy(ies), including switching to reduced paid-up or extended term
insurance by automatic operation of the terms and conditions, exercising automatic premium loan, premium holiday or lapsation, etc .; or
4. Transferring or assigning ownership of existing life insurance policy(ies).
1. 行使現有人壽保單內之權利,包括提取全部或部份保單款項、退保或部份退保等,以減少現有人壽保單的現金價值總額、保險金額、
其他保單價值或保單權益;
2. 從現有人壽保單中提取保單貸款;
3. 減少、暫停或終止支付現有人壽保單之保費,包括藉保單條款及細則自動運作的情況下使其變為減額清繳保單或展期保單、執行自動
保費貸款、執行保費假期條款或保單失效等;或
4.
更改現有人壽保單的擁有權或將其轉讓。
□
Yes (Please complete the Life Insurance Policy Replacement Declaration, read carefully and sign the Declaration below)
是(請填寫《人壽保險客戶轉保聲明書》並詳閱下列聲明及簽署)
□
No (Please read carefully and sign the Declaration below)
否(請詳閱下列聲明及簽署)
Warning: Please answer the above questions carefully. Making changes or replacing your existing life insurance policy(ies) with your new life
insurance policy (i.e. policy replacement) may not be in your best interest. To protect your interests, you should approach the insurer of your
existing life insurance policy(ies) to obtain up to date information on your existing life insurance policy(ies) and your insurance intermediary
should assist you to evaluate and compare your existing and new life insurance policies. If your above answer is "Yes", your insurance intermediary
must assist you to complete the "Life Insurance Policy Replacement Declaration" and explain to you the implications and disadvantages of
financial, insurability and claims eligibility of such policy replacement.
警告:請 閣下慎重回答以上問題。以新人壽保單變更或取替現有人壽保單(即轉保)未必符合 閣下的最佳利益。為保障 閣下之利益,
閣下應向現有人壽保單的保險公司索取最新資料,而有關保險中介人亦應協助 閣下對現有人壽保單及新人壽保單進行評估及比較。倘
閣下上述回覆為“是”,有關保險中介人必須協助 閣下填寫《人壽保險客戶轉保聲明書》及解釋有關轉保對 閣下的財務、受保資格及
索償資格所帶來之影響及弊端。

results.content_en:
er and withdrawal of cash value within the first 5 policy years. 以下提取費用適用於首5個
保單年之退保及保單戶口現金價值提取:
● Within 1st year 第一年內 - 8%
● Within 2nd year 第二年內 - 6%
● Within 3rd year 第三年內 - 4%
●
Within 4th year 第四年內 - 2%
● Within 5th year 第五年內 - 1%

00000000
Prudential Hong Kong Limited 保誠保險有限公司
Part of Prudential plc (United Kingdom) 保誠集團成員
PDD/PAIPPW (06/25)
1/5
PAIPPW0401Part 1 第一部分 Policy Surrender / Withdrawal of Cash Value 退保/提取現金價值指示
I understand and consent that after deducting all other relevant redemption charges as listed above (if applicable), the surrender value / policy account value
will be reduced by the percentage of MVA based on the receipt date of this fully completed form with the required supporting documents by Prudential. I further
understand that the MVA, when applied, reduces the surrender value / policy account value to reflect the market value movement
of the underlying assets of the captioned policy. 本人明白及同意在扣除上表所列之提取費用後(如適用),退保價值/保單戶口價值須減去有關
市場價值調整金額,該金額將以保誠收到此完全填妥表格及相關文件當日之百分比計算;本人並明白保誠行使市場價值調整將會調低
退保價值/保單戶口價值,從而反映有關保單旗下資產的變動。
Requested Effective Date # :
要求生效日期:
Day 日
/
/
Month 月
Year年
# Leave this blank unless you have specific request on the effective date of
change. Prudential shall have the right to determine the effective date of
change upon acceptance of the Application. 如對更改生效日期沒有特別
要求,不用填寫此欄。於接受更改申請時,保誠有權決定更改之
生效日期。
Withdraw Cash Value of Policy Account (Cheque Amount) 提取保單戶口現金價值(支票金額)
USD/HKD 美元 /港元
Surrender 退保
Reason for Surrender (Please choose ONE appropriate answer) 申請退保原因(請選擇一個最適當的答案)
Change in Insurance needs 保險需求有所改變
Change in financial condition 財務狀況改變
Replaced by another insurance plan 以其他保險產品取代
Returns below expectations 保單回報未如理想
Coverage not comprehensive 保障不夠全面
Payment tenor is too long 付款期過長
Urgent need of Money 急需用錢
Lost confidence in the economy and future 對前景及經濟失去信心
Residing overseas 移居外地
Other Reason 其他理由
Unwilling to disclose reason 不願意披露理由
Part 2 第二部分 Payment Instruction 付款指示
1. All payments would be issued by cheque and in the name of the policyowner. For policy with collateral assignment, please state the payee of the cheque.
所有款項將以支票直接給予保單持有人。如保單已作抵押轉讓,請指示支票抬頭人。
2. If no payment option is selected, payment will be issued in HKD cheque. 如沒有選擇付款方式,款項會以港元支票簽發。
3. The cheque will be posted to the policyowner's correspondence address in Prudential's by registered mail, unless otherwise specify in the "Delivery Option"
below. 除在以下註明遞交方式,支票將會以掛號形式郵寄到保單持有人在保誠記錄上的通訊地址。
4. If the policyowner selects to collect the cheque at a branch of Standard Chartered Bank (Hong Kong) Limited (SCB) or at our Customer Service Centre(CSC),
please specify the SCB branch code, or the CSC location and policyowner's contact number. 如選擇到渣打銀行(香港)有限公司分行或本公司客戶
服務中心領取,請註明分行編號,或客戶服務中心地點及保單持有人聯絡號碼。
Payment Option 付款方式
HKD Cheque 港元支票
(Applicable to USD / HKD Policy 適用於美元及港元保單)
Local USD Cheque 本地美元支票
(Applicable to USD Policy 適用於美元保單)
Overseas USD Cheque 海外美元支票
(Applicable to USD Policy 適用於美元保單)
For Policy with collateral assignee, please state the payee of the cheque 如保單已作抵押轉讓,請指示支票收款人

Collateral Assignee 抵押轉讓之承讓人

Posted to Policyowner's correspondence address in our record. 郵寄到保單持有人在本公司記錄上的通訊地址

results.title_name_en: Change of Automatic Premium Loan Option
results.title_name_tc: 更改自動保費貸款選項
results.content_en:
PRUDENTIAL
英 國
保 誠本
1
Consultant's Name
顧問姓名:
Division - Agent Code
組別-營業員編號:
Proposal / Policy Number(s)
申請書編號/保單號碼:
Life Proposed / Life Assured's Name
受保人姓名:
Application Form for Automatic Premium Loan Option
自動保費貸款選項申請表
Automatic Premium Loan Option
自動保費貸款選項
Declaration
聲明
I request to apply Automatic Premium Loan clause to the policy which the amount of premium or premium and levy shall be automatically
deemed to be paid by a premium loan and extend to the premium(s) or premium(s) and levy(ies) for any supplementary benefit(s) when the
Plan is paid up.
本人申請應用自動保費貸款條文於此保單,即保費或保費及徵費將自動以貸款的形式繳交,並延續條文於本計劃已繳清所有保費時的附加保障之保費
或保費及徵費。
I declare that I have read and confirm understanding of the important notes below.
本人在此聲明本人已閱讀並確認明白下列注意事項之內容。
Important Notes
注意事項
1. We shall charge you interest on the Automatic Premium Loan(s) starting from the date when the respective Automatic Premium Loan(s)
is incurred. We shall determine the interest rate charged on the Automatic Premium Loan(s).
本公司將會由自動保費貸款日期開始收取自動保費貸款的利息,有關利率將由本公司釐訂。
2. The policy will be automatically terminated once the total outstanding loan amount (including interest) owing to us under your policy
exceeds stated percentage on Policy Contract of the guaranteed cash value of your policy minus all Advanced Claims being paid and / or
payable of this Plan.
本計劃將在 閣下的保單所欠本公司之未償還總金額(包括利息)超過合約訂明比率之保單保證現金價值扣除於本計劃須支付及/或已付訖的預
支賠償總額時立即終止。
I/We declare that I/we have read and confirm understanding of the above content.
本人/吾等在此聲明本人/吾等已閱讀並確認明白上述之內容。
Day
日
Month
月
Year
年
Signature of Proposer / Policyowner
(if other than the Life Proposed / Life
Assured)
投保人/保單持有人簽署(如投保人/保單持有
人與受保人同為一人,可免簽署此欄)
Signature of Life Proposed / Life Assured
(who has attained age 18 or above)
受保人簽署(適用於十八歲或以上的受保人)
Signature of Consultant as Witness
顧問 ( 即見證人 ) 簽署
Name 姓名:
Two witnesses are required if signature chop or fingerprint is used to sign. 若以圖章蓋印或指紋簽署,須有兩位見證人。
Please DO NOT sign on BLANK form. 請勿在空白表格上簽署。
Prudential Hong Kong Limited (A member of Prudential plc group)
保誠保險有限公司(英國保誠集團成員)

results.title_name_en: How To Read A Renewal Policy Checklist & Reminder Email
results.title_name_tc: 如何解讀續保保單清單及提示電郵
results.content_en:
SEVEN
10/04/2014
Remark (*): Policy is to be auto-renewed upon policy expiry. Please settle the outstanding premium by cheque and coverage validity shall be subject to successful premium collection.
If you have already notified us to confirm the renewal, please ignore this email. Thanks for your attention.
Policy Administration - Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited
25/05/2014
Please do not reply to this e-mail. Mail sent to this address cannot be answered.
1
PGHK | 內部文件,只供理財顧問傳閱–不得外傳2. 續保保單清單–月中提示每月發出,電郵題目為“GIEB Renewal 2nd Reminder & Expired Policy List"
發出日期:每月月中
(A)表:列出本月內將要到期並已發出續保通知書的保單
(B)表:列出上月份和本月份已到期並已發出續保通知書的保單
例子:如電郵發出日期為16/5/2014,(A)表將會列出由 16/5/2014 至31/5/2014 到期的保單,而(B)表將會列出由 1/4/2014 至
15/5/2014 已到期的保單(請注意:保單清單只包括以支票付款的一般保險的產品)
附有(*)的保單號碼將會於到期月最後一個工作天自動續保,惟有關保單以支票繳付保費,故此,提示電郵提醒您與客人聯絡,以
跟進支票付款事宜。
請注意:本續保保單清單–月中提示只包括以支票付款的一般保險的產品
電郵樣本

DATCLN0406Part 5 第五部分 TUMOUR QUESTIONNAIRE for Proposed New Life Assured 擬定之新受保人的腫瘤問卷
To be completed by the proposed new life proposed. 由擬定之新受保人作答。
No 否
Yes 是
1. a) When was the tumour first found? 腫瘤何時發現?
b) What was the precise diagnosis? 診斷結果?
c) What was the date of diagnosis? 作出診斷的日期?
2.
What was the site or organ involved? 腫瘤的位置或牽涉的器官?
Was it benign or malignant in nature? 腫瘤的性質是良性或惡性?
3. What period of time were there between initial finding of a growth and its subsequent removal? 發現腫瘤後,相隔多久才將之割除?
Please give approximate dates. 請說明大概日期。
4. a) How long have you been in hospital? 閣下住院多久?
C
No 否
Yes 是
b) If no operation was advised, is there any change in size of the tumour?
如腫瘤沒有割除之必要,則腫瘤之大小有否改變?
If so, please give details. 如有,請詳述。
5.
What kind of treatment were given and for how long? 曾接受何種治療及治療的時間多久?
6.
Have you received any radiotherapy or chemotherapy? 曾否接受任何電療或化療?
○ No 否
C
Yes 是

C
No 否
Yes 是

10. Please enclose pathological report for review, if available. 請提供有關之病理報告。

results.content_en:
00
≥ 50
≥ 10
1.2
Definitions
Loss ratio (%)
Claims paid amount (HK$) in past 12 months / Gross Premium
(HK$) in past 12 months
Hit rate (%)
No. of claims incident in past 12 months / No. of policy in past
12 months.
Incident count
Distinct incident date per Agent per policy basis in a particular
product is counted as one Incident Count
1.3
Annual review period based on the past 12 months on calendar year basis, i.e.
1 January to 31 December.
4
Claim Control Policy Version 1.0 - 10/11/2021
理賠監管措施1.4
Claim records of each agent hit all of three criteria i.e. loss ratio, hit rate and
incident count of Travel and/or Accident Products would lead to sales suspension.
1.5
SRD / RDs as Agent role are excluded from suspension.
1.6
High orphan ratio Agent (i.e. ≥60% of claims generated from orphan policies) are
excluded from suspension.
1.7
Agents suspended by The Claims Committee of Prudential Hong Kong Ltd under
Accident Category will also be suspended by PGHK for Accident Products.
2.
Control Action
2.1
Sales suspension lasts for one year (e.g. 1 April 2022 to 31 March 2023).
2.2
Sales suspension is separated by Product, i.e. Travel Products and/or Accident
Products.
2.3
Control action of sales suspension
2.3.1 Those hit the criteria of Travel Products: suspend for sales as new business,
any addition and / or increase in benefits, and any upgrade.
2.3.2 Those hit the criteria of Accident Products: suspend for sales as new
business, any addition and/or increase in benefits, and any upgrade.
3.
Procedures
3.1
Claim team releases the list of sales suspension based on the results of the annual
review of 1 January to 31 December of last year in February.
3.2
BD Team will communicate by email to the suspended agent and c.c. his/her upline,
RM & RD in February to March regarding the suspension decision of the concerned
products.
3.3
If the suspended agent needs to appeal, he/she needs to provide sound
justification with supporting document to BD within 7 working days after the email.
5
Claim Control Policy Version 1.0 - 10/11/2021
理賠監管措施

理賠監管措施1.4
Claim records of each agent hit all of three criteria i.e. loss ratio, hit rate and
incident count of Travel and/or Accident Products would lead to sales suspension.
1.5
SRD / RDs as Agent role are excluded from suspension.
1.6
High orphan ratio Agent (i.e. ≥60% of claims generated from orphan policies) are
excluded from suspension.
1.7
Agents suspended by The Claims Committee of Prudential Hong Kong Ltd under
Accident Category will also be suspended by PGHK for Accident Products.
2.
Control Action
2.1
Sales suspension lasts for one year (e.g. 1 April 2022 to 31 March 2023).
2.2
Sales suspension is separated by Product, i.e. Travel Products and/or Accident
Products.
2.3
Control action of sales suspension
2.3.1 Those hit the criteria of Travel Products: suspend for sales as new business,
any addition and / or increase in benefits, and any upgrade.
2.3.2 Those hit the criteria of Accident Products: suspend for sales as new
business, any addition and/or increase in benefits, and any upgrade.
3.
Procedures
3.1
Claim team releases the list of sales suspension based on the results of the annual
review of 1 January to 31 December of last year in February.
3.2
BD Team will communicate by email to the suspended agent and c.c. his/her upline,
RM & RD in February to March regarding the suspension decision of the concerned
products.
3.3
If the suspended agent needs to appeal, he/she needs to provide sound
justification with supporting document to BD within 7 working days after the email.

Claim Control Policy Version 1.0 - 10/11/2021
